title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
0 - Makes an attempt, but answer is without merit because it rewrites the question, merely describes the paintings, or makes only incorrect statements.

1 - Correctly discusses 1 issue only. May contain significant errors.

2 - Correctly discusses 2 issues. May ignore either the social/historical element of the question or the form/content element. May contain significant errors.

3 - Correctly discusses 3 issues. Must discuss both the social/historical element of the question and the form/content element. Discussion is incomplete, unbalanced, and may contain significant errors.

4 - Correctly discusses 4 issues. Must discuss at least 2 social and/or historical themes in Lawrence’s work AND 2 relationships between form and content. Discussion is full and contains no significant errors.
descriptions: Makes an attempt, but answer is without merit because it rewrites the question, merely describes the paintings, or makes only incorrect statements.
Correctly discusses 1 issue only. May contain significant errors.
Correctly discusses 2 issues. May ignore either the social/historical element of the question or the form/content element. May contain significant errors.
Correctly discusses 3 issues. Must discuss both the social/historical element of the question and the form/content element. Discussion is incomplete, unbalanced, and may contain significant errors.

Correctly discusses 4 issues. Must discuss at least 2 social and/or historical themes in Lawrence’s work AND 2 relationships between form and content. Discussion is full and contains no significant errors.
